Change your....question: How to change name on Groww?

Change your....question: How to change password on Groww?
Change your....answerHtml:
On app: you will find the option to change your password in the 'You' section.

On website: click on the profile in the right top corner and then, click on your name. You will see the option to change the password here.

Change your....question: How to change Groww PIN?
Change your....answerHtml:
On app: you will find the option to change your PIN in the 'You' section.

On website: click on the profile in the right top corner and then, click on your name. You will see the option to change the PIN here.

Change your....question: My issue is not listed here.
